message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point, but I'm interested in seeing if we can reach a deal that benefits both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a price of $15,000 for the product.
